Key Match Events: The Mavericks had a ten-point lead in the first quarter but allowed Houston to get back into it by letting them get to the free-throw line.
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd went to Maxi Kleber at center, who wasn't much better after Daniel Gafford played poorly.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks turned the ball over 20 times on Wednesday night, which led to 22 Houston points.
Others: Dereck Lively II had eight points, six rebounds, six assists, four blocks, and four fouls and was a +5 in 20 minutes, while Daniel Gafford had a -27 in just 11 minutes.
